title: Which is the better processor, an i3 8th generation or a Core i5 5th generation? - Quora

response.answer_text: For gaming and editing go for i5 8 gen. The beast for budget gamers.i3 8 gen proccesor is person who want to surf play normal low graphics game and normal video editing In recent test i5 8 gen has beat i7 7 gen proccesor in terms of benchmarks Mostly proccesor helps to run the game but the most important role is gpu if u have 6 gb gpu u can play games in high settings without any laggy experience and same the i5 8 gen has 2gb gpu then the game will be laggy in high settings and not smooth experience low fps I5 8 gen is future proof u can close your eyes and buy this budget beast I3 8 gen will be old and most of heavy software will be not running smoothly after some years So choose as per your requirements Hope u get the points For more info watch this video

Well an i3 8th gen(I am considering the base i3 8100 which is more common, not the 8300K) is highly powerful, better than the Ryzen 3 2200G(not GPUwise) and R3 1300X. And offcourse its better and powerful than the i5 5th gen(desktop) as 8100 has better cache memories. Elsewise, 8100 is much similar to a i5 7400(almost similarly powerful). That's for desktop.In laptops processors, an i3 8th gen(8130U) is way way better and powerful than an i5 5200U(5th gen).
